markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Students of the Magaambya](/Articles.aspx?ID=46)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 66</row>

Student life involves more than classes and studying. Meet the colorful cast of NPCs destined to become the heroes' friends and rivals in the magic academy.
name: Students of the Magaambya
